name: 勞維俊
objective: 本課程透過研讀文學經典著作學習英文。研讀名著既可領略文學經典蘊含的智慧、對生命的洞見，又可藉細讀作品的遣詞造句和謀篇佈局吸取英文精華，培養對文字的敏感和創意。

scorePolicy:

Remarks:
Group Presentation: (week 14)
Number of students in a group: 3-4, depending on the total number of students
Requirement: to give a critical presentation of a chosen topic on a text studied
Time limit: 20 min presentation, 5 min Q&A.
materials:
Essay: (week 18)
To write a critical essay (1000-1200 words) on the text(s) studied. Various topics will be given during the lectures. The topic and the text should be agreed with the instructor by week 15.
